channel.title: Best New Albums - Pitchfork
channel.description: The best new releases from Pitchfork, the most trusted voice in music.

item.title: Dehd: Flower of Devotion
item.description: Recording in a studio, the Chicago DIY trio sound newly airy and lush, but no less direct and sincere. Their confidence in their concision is the best part.
item.dc:creator: Steven Arroyo

item.title: Julianna Barwick: Healing Is a Miracle
item.description: The vocalist and producer Juliana Barwick’s revelatory new album asks us to picture healing at a moment when the task feels impossible.
item.dc:creator: Will Gottsegen

item.title: Special Interest: The Passion Of
item.description: Mixing art-punk, industrial, and techno, the outstanding New Orleans four-piece emerge with a blistering vision of punk as possibility.
item.dc:creator: Jenn Pelly
